description: This file contains CSS styles for the Todo application, including custom properties for theme management and styles for various components like App, App-header, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the Todo application with styles for centering content and applying the primary background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application that includes layout adjustments and background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the application, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for the links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button with animations and responsive design.
